title: Role of media in providing information to citizens

content.question: Which of the following is a true statement about the role of the media in providing citizens with information?

choices.label: Investigative reporting dominates the news because it is less expensive than political commentary.
Demand for instantaneous news reporting has led to the growth of 24-hour news operations and a shift to online media consumption.
The media is increasingly controlled by the major political parties, who determine which stories are covered by the press.
There has been an increase in social media and Internet news consumption by the public, causing the top five media conglomerates to have greater control over public opinion.

content.answer: Demand for instantaneous news reporting has led to the growth of 24-hour news operations and a shift to online media consumption.
